channel.title: Project situation on SDN-Cloudstack - Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Project situation on SDN-Cloudstack - Documentation

item.title: Context
item.description: The IUT of Chalons-en-Champagne proposes a teaching based on practice. To this end, classrooms are available to students, equipped with network equipment. Services to deploy The different practical courses require the deployment of different services adapted to the different needs of the practical course. These different services are extensions of those present in the Data-Center. In concrete terms, these services are projected onto the network sockets in front of the switch in each workstation room in a fixed and manual way.
